name: CD- City Driver
description:
We know you are here with a hope to find drifting car game that suits you perfectly. You can choose from classic cars to the most modern driving cars with amazing physics engine that can deliver the most realistic racing and drifting fun. Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Be a furious racer and burn the asphalt of this open world city with new car driving experience for all the drift simulator fans!
Features:
More than 5 type of environments
More than 12 different type of cars
Realistic car physics
Easy and smooth car controls
